text: Yā pana bhikkhunī jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī jātarūparajataṃ uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā upanikkhittaṃ vā sādiyeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 21. Should any bhikkhunī take gold and silver, or have it taken, or consent to its being deposited (nearher), it is to be forfeited and confessed.
